prompt: Create a visually imaginative, high-converting website for {{business_name}}, a {{service_type}}. The design should blend premium modern aesthetics with playful unexpected details. Start by running 'npm create vite@latest project-name --template react' to set up the project, then build the website using Vite for fast development and optimal performance.
required_sections: Navbar (sticky, animated hover effects, creative link styling, logo for {{business_name}})
Hero section (full-width animated multi-stop gradient background: {{hero_gradient}}, oversized headline, punchy tagline, bold CTA: {{cta_text}}), a great side photo or form
About section (personal, visually engaging, image or illustrated brand element for {{business_name}})
Services section (service cards with icons/images, hover effects, staggered animations)
Testimonials section (glassmorphism cards, profile photos, star ratings, quote marks)
Footer ({{business_name}} logo, key links, socials, business info)

style.layout: modern, airy, soft rounded corners, generous white space
details: subtle animated shapes or blobs floating in the background
style.imagery: high-quality photos or whimsical illustrations matching the brand personality of {{business_name}}

random_creative_touches: add a tiny hidden easter egg in the footer
use gradient text fills in unexpected spots
add slow parallax movement on hero background
make one section feel like a poster design
floating CTA button with a gentle bounce animation
add a subtle animated mascot or character element related to {{business_name}}
mobile_experience: keep animations but adjust for clarity; no clutter, maintain same personality
vibe: approachable yet premium; feels trustworthy and local but with surprising modern twists
